[White "Wyllie, J."]
[Site "Alwick"]

1. 11-15 24-20 2. 8-11 28-24 3. 9-13 22-18 4. 15x22 25x18 5. 4-8 26-22 6. 10-14
18x9 7. 5x14 22-18 8. 1-5 18x9 9. 5x14 29-25 10. 11-15 24-19 11. 15x24 25-22 12.
24-28 22-18 13. 6-9 27-24 14. 8-11 24-19 15. 7-10 20-16 16. 11x20 18-15 17. 2-6
15-11 18. 12-16 19x12 19. 10-15 11-8 20. 15-18 21-17 21. 13x22 30-26 22. 18x27
26x17x10x1 0-1

5-9 7-2 28. 9-14 27-23 29. 13-17 2-7 30. 4-8 3x12 31. 10x3 23-19 32. 17-22 19-15

38. 22-18 6-2 39. 14-17 12-16 40. 17-22 16-20 41. 22-26 19-16 42. 18-15 16-12
43. 26-31 20-24 44. 15-11 2-6 1/2-1/2

17. 7-11 23-19 18. 20-24 14-10 19. 9-14 18x9 20. 11x18x25 10x1 21. 5x14 30x21
22. 14-18 1-5 23. 24-28 5-9 24. 28-32 9-14 25. 18-23 26-22 26. 23-26 19-15 27.
12-16 15-10 28. 26-31 14-9 29. 31-27 10-6 30. 27-23 9-5 31. 2x9 5x14 32. 16-20
13-9 33. 20-24 9-5 34. 24-27 5-1 35. 27-31 22-17 36. 8-11 17-13 37. 11-16 13-9
38. 31-26 21-17 39. 26-22 17-13 40. 22-18 9-5 1/2-1/2

[Site "London"]

12x3 17. 26-30 25-21 18. 11-15 3-7 19. 22-26 31x22 20. 18x25 29x22 21. 6-10 7x14

1. 11-15 23-19 2. 8-11 22-17 3. 11-16 24-20 4. 16x23 27x18x11 5. 7x16 20x11 6.
3-7 25-22 7. 7x16 22-18 8. 9-14 18x9 9. 6x13x22 26x17 10. 5-9 30-26 11. 10-15
28-24 12. 4-8 24-20 13. 16-19 29-25 14. 8-11 25-22 15. 2-7 32-27 16. 19-24 27-23
17. 15-19 23x16 18. 12x19 17-13 19. 9-14 31-27 20. 24x31 22-17 1/2-1/2

[Event "Glasgow 1858, game 3"]
[Date "1858-??-??"]
[Black "Martins, R."]
[White "McKerrow, J."]
[Site "Glasgow"]
[Result "1/2-1/2"]
[Round "3"]
1. 11-15 22-17 2. 8-11 17-13 3. 4-8 23-19 4. 15-18 24-20 5. 11-15 28-24 6. 9-14
26-23 7. 8-11 31-26 8. 6-9 13x6 9. 2x9 26-22 10. 3-8 32-28 11. 1-6 30-26 12.
9-13 19-16 13. 12x19 23x16 14. 13-17 22x13 15. 8-12 24-19 16. 15x24x31 26-22 17.
12x19 22x15x8 18. 14-17 21x14 19. 10x17 25-21 20. 17-22 8-3 21. 7-10 3-8 22.
31-26 8-11 23. 19-23 28-24 24. 10-14 24-19 25. 23-27 19-16 26. 27-31 16-12 27.
31-27 12-8 28. 27-23 20-16 29. 23-19 16-12 30. 26-23 8-3 31. 23-18 12-8 32.
22-26 8-4 33. 26-30 4-8 34. 30-26 8-12 35. 19-15 12-8 36. 15-19 8-12 37. 18-22

5-9 11-16 44. 26-23 7-11 45. 9-13 3-7 46. 1-6 7-3 47. 6-10 16-12 48. 18-22 12-16
49. 23-26 16-19 50. 26-30 3-8 51. 22-18 19-24 52. 18-23 8-12 53. 14-18 11-16 54.
18-22 16-19 55. 23x16 12x19 56. 22-26 19-23 57. 26-31 24-19 58. 10-14 19-24 59.

[Round "17"]

[Round "5"]

[Event "Newcastle 1863, game 7"]
[Date "1863-??-??"]
[Black "Grant, B."]
[White "Fletcher, T."]
[Site "Newcastle"]
[Result "1-0"]
[Round "7"]
1. 9-14 22-18 2. 5-9 25-22 3. 12-16 29-25 4. 8-12 18-15 5. 11x18 22x15 6. 10x19

2-7 11x2 18. 9-13 2x9 19. 5x14x23x32 17-14 20. 32-27 14-10 21. 27-31 26-22 22.
19-23 22-18 23. 23-27 18-14 24. 27-32 10-6 25. 32-27 14-9 26. 27-23 6-2 27.
31-27 9-5 28. 23-19 5-1 29. 27-23 1-6 30. 19-15 28-24 31. 23-18 24-20 32. 3-7
2x11 33. 15x8 20-16 34. 18-15 16-12 35. 8-11 30-26 36. 15-18 6-9 37. 13-17 9-13
38. 18-22 26-23 39. 17-21 1-0
